Hyperspan Website

This repository contains the Hyperspan website and documentation. It is a
dynamic web framework built with Bun and TypeScript.

Use the documentation pages below as the source of truth for features, API
usage, and examples. Docs pages will return markdown for known LLMs and AI
bots, and HTML pages for all other user agents.

Docs index:
- /docs
- /docs/install
- /docs/structure
- /docs/philosophy
- /docs/server
- /docs/request-context
- /docs/middleware
- /docs/routes
- /docs/routes/composition
- /docs/streaming
- /docs/layouts
- /docs/html
- /docs/styles
- /docs/env
- /docs/config
- /docs/actions
- /docs/clientjs
- /docs/clientjs/vanilla
- /docs/clientjs/islands
